document_data.name: East Thorass
document_data.mainbody: The '''East Thorass languages''' subgrouping was a small branch of the [[Thorass languages]] group.<ref name=D:SiT-p28>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28}}
document_data.Languages: This grouping included [[Telpi]] and its several dialects.<ref name=D:SiT-p28/>
